text:
A Madrassa teacher has been arrested for allegedly chaining two minor students in Alwar district of Rajasthan.

Sahil (14) and Musharff (8) managed to escape from the Madrassa on Friday and reached the Alwar (Junction) railway station with chains in their legs. Onlookers then informed the police, SP Ajay Pal Lamba said on Saturday.

They were freed and handed over to a child welfare committee, Mr. Lamba added.

A case against the accused, Maulana Ayub, was registered and he was arrested under the Juvenile Justice Act, he said.. — PTI
title: Madrassa teacher held
